resources.string: Brazil has won the FIFA World Cup five times.
The Copa America is the oldest international continental football competition.
The first FIFA World Cup was held in Uruguay in 1930.
The goalkeeper is the only player who can use their hands anywhere on the field.
A soccer team consists of 11 players on the field.
The United States has never reached the semi-finals of the FIFA World Cup.
Are you sure you want to do this?
